111331.content:
"Move it thunder thighs!" yelled Kamina as team gurren gathered up their supplies to embark towards the capital.

Yoko blushed at Kamina's comment then looked down at her thighs.

"My thighs aren't that fat, what's he talking about?" Yoko grumbled inspecting her lower body.

"Come on Yoko move that big heavy ass of yours!" Kamina hollared.

"Wha-what!?" Yoko nervously said quickly looking at her ass.

Despite the comments, Yoko was still the thin curvy girl. Her slim thighs and perky butt still complimented her outfit. However Yoko's mental state was beginning to waver. Yoko then pulled out some food and began comfort eating.

"Say what are you doing?" a curious Leron inquired.

"I just needed something to eat." Yoko growled with a mouthful of food.

"Just be careful, we wouldn't want to lose our girlish figure now would we." Leron chuckled as he went ahead.

"Hmmph girlish figure, all Kamina does is tease me nomph." Yoko said before taking a huge bite.

Yoko then...

"Hahahaha you all will make fine gifts for the spiral king." said the nocturnal beastman. "Save us Kamina!" shrieked the black sibling sisters. "Like I'd ever be some slave to a evil king." Yoko scowled in defiance thrashing about in the cage. "Hmm? Looks like this one has to be housebroken." said the beast woman. "Separate the fiesty redhead, I've got plans for her." ordered the foxlike woman. "Hey what are you doing! no- let me go!" Yoko squeeled as she was seized by a cluster of toady girls. Despite her admirable struggle, the toadies brought Yoko back to the dining area were the fox woman was eagerly waiting.

"Let me go!" Yoko demanded. "No you're far too hot headed for the spiral king's regal taste. But I've got a use for a wily naked ape female such as yourself. You see I have attractive women of all kinds here to attract wandering naked apes but I'm missing a certain type of woman..."the foxlady said as bunny girls bring in platters and platters of piles of food. "You see were short a token fat girl and since you're so lively I figured you'd make the perfect fat girl." said the grinning fox woman. Yoko's eyes opened wide as her face began to quiver "N-n-no you wouldn't really do that." said a nervous Yoko as bunny girls approached her. "Make sure she eats everything I'll go see to the other girls." said the foxlady. "Aye aye maam" said the bunny girls in unison.

A pair of bunny girls held Yoko down, who was still in her white bikini, while other bunny girls brought food up to the squirming Yoko. "Open wide" said a cute pink haired bunnygirl. "No nmm!" Yoko said clutching her mouth shut. However the bunny girl was determined to fatten up the captive and managed to shove a large piece of meat in her mouth. "Now chew we don't want you choking now do we." the bunny said holding her hand over Yoko's mouth. GULP "Good now have some more." the bunny girl said cramming more meat in the hapless eater's mouth. "Please stop no mor-mphfh" Yoko pleaded as she had some buttered bread smooshed through her lips. "Now I wouldn't have to be so forceful if you just submitted and eat up like a good girl and get nice and fat." replied the forcefeeder. "Now eat you must eat more." said the bunnygirl grabbing some chicken and pressing it up to Yoko's messy face.

After the first session, Yoko has gained...

1321.content:
As the humans took over the world previously ruled by the Spiral King, the members of team Dai Gurren now had to face their futures. "Sorry Simone but I'm just not cut out for this government stuff." were Yoko's departing words as she got on her hover bike and left the growing capitol. Soaring through the sky, Yoko wondered where she'd go. As time passed Yoko grew hungry. Finding a diner, Yoko landed and went in for a bite. Upon entering Yoko was greeted by the sight of several fat boisterous women who were surprisingly skimpily dressed. Seeing the other women in revealing outfits gave Yoko a sense of ease since she enjoys sporting bikini tops as her casual attire. Yoko took a seat at the counter and ordered a nice meal.

As Yoko ate the fat women began to get rowdy and began wrestling each other. "Hey not in the diner!" shouted the proprietor. "Aww come on, we're just fooling around." hollered one of the fat women. "Rowdy sumo women." grumbled the owner. Yoko turned her head, peering over at the sumo girls and...

153.content:
Life had become far easier for humans now that they lived on the surface. No longer restrained by underground primitive living, civilization greatly prospered. It took no time at all for the people to adapt to their more opulent lifestyles. The younger generations couldn't even imagine the arduous endeavor that subterranean living posed. In fact most kids only had to worry about school.

"OOF!" a kid fell on the path as he walked to school.

A rather large figure approached the fallen boy riding a scooter.

"You can get up on your own, right?" sweetly spoke the massive figure.

The boy looked at the soothing figure. It was a wide woman with long red hair eating. She looked constricted in her taut dress. Huge boobs prevented any attempts at buttoning her shirt, a belly wrapped tightly by tenuous fabric, her sleeves seemed skin tight nearing ripping as did every other seam on the woman's dress. Her butt was oozing off the sides of the seat that sunk deeply between her gelatinous orbs.

"Uh I'm fine." said the boy dusting himself off.

"That's my little man." praised the woman taking a bite out of a burger before riding off.

The boy watched the woman ride off captivated by her beauty. "Oooh I hope I see her again."

Upon arriving at school the boy gathered with the other kids to meet their teacher. To the boy's glee his teacher was the scooter riding woman. As the corpulent woman stood before the class the boy noticed that she looked even fatter than he thought. The woman weighed at least 300 pounds.

"Hello students, I shall be your teacher, Ms Yomako."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------

Little did the kids know that their obese teacher was really Yoko Littner the sniper from Team Dai Gurren. Yoko had been served as a teacher for many years now. Starting with her slim figure, the years had added many layers of fat to her frame. With society improving people became more sedentary especially Yoko who found herself sitting down all the time. It also didn't help that numerous fastfood establishments had popped up on the quaint little island causing Yoko to become fiercely addicted to the greasy food.
153.title: Ms Yomako's fat
